title: Customized Sex Education Instructional Design Workshop for Adolescents with Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Requires enhancing the ability to design sex education content reflecting the physical and emotional characteristics of adolescents with disabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can explain sex education objectives for adolescents with disabilities by distinguishing at least three developmental stages
Learners can apply three core techniques (visual supports, social skills training, situational role-playing) for designing customized sex education guides
Learners can produce three types of mobile-compatible microlearning sex education content (video, interactive quiz, image cards)

resources: PDF Casebook of Sex Education by Disability Type
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
